Articles.Content: I thought adding KSP as a non steam would be enough. No Steam for me then.
so if there is going to be armadillos in ksp then why make them normal?, i think killer armadillos are much better

...No.

See signature.

You could buy the humble indie bundle 8 for $5.75, get the steam keys, and activate them on steam. Then you would have 4 games

Probably the cheapest way to get that going

You could buy the humble indie bundle 8 for $5.75, get the steam keys, and activate them on steam. Then you would have 4 games

Probably the cheapest way to get that going

I'm sure there is a single game that costs less though...I know I've seen one.
So i discovered that i can post in discussions but i can't comment on the group?

Discussion threads work just fine, only issue is with some not being able to chat...

So the plan works but has a few holes to fill in

So as for PfL, I'm testing some new styles via non-PfL pics, seems to work rather well
Tell you what, Trekkette. If Chobit doesn't buy you anything by the time I'm back on my own computer, end of the week, I'm buying something small for you.

Tell you what, Trekkette. If Chobit doesn't buy you anything by the time I'm back on my own computer, end of the week, I'm buying something small for you.

Quoth the Chobit "Don't let Satchi buy you a game! Is my job!"

I'm not entirely sure how to take that from him...

@ Canopus - yeah, it's kinda a pain...

I've been thinking about this: What if, someone made it possible to get some sort of chatbox on the PfL website?

... As I'm completely against steam. Because they're like "F*** you! 1$ = Ã¢â€šÂ¬1,-" Which, of course, makes direct purchases from the KSP website much cheaper for Europeans, as 23 USD equals 18 EUR and not 23 EUR.

What seems to be the problem?
Steam just ruined my copy of KSP just by opening it trough their library. And why can't i post in the discussions anymore?
Okay, scratch that... we'll just have to get along without it... :\

Guys, a lot of the discussion going on here is not about PfL. I have removed a couple of Off-Topic posts as it's becoming a chat thread. If this continues it may warrant the thread's closure - an action I would prefer not to take.

Perhaps try to use a service such as TinyChat or the many free Chatrooms around the Internet instead of chatting here, thanks.
